NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
aK
OFFICE OF THE REGIONAL DIRECTOR
Television Region VI
Seattle, Washington
September 22, I960
Tet Harry Skoraia
Bill Harley ^
Fronts Loren SI
Is there anything I can or should be doing toward the
meeting!# in San Francisco?
Is it planned to have separate TV Board and Radio Board
meetings?
Should I perhaps query the other members of the TV Board to
see if they have matters needing the Board* s consideration?
Should I query Jack McBride, chairman of the TV Policy
Committee to see if his grouqp has matters they wish the
Board to consider? If so, should I ask Jack to sit in on
any meetings of the TV Board?
I know of no matters needing a meeting of the TV Board, but
I want to be helpful in any way 1 can, so let me know if and
whay you think I can be doing that will be useful*
Best regards to both of you*
